chapters.summaryKo: 도망친 종 오네시모를 형제로 받아주길 빌레몬에게 탄원합니다.
chapters.summaryEn: Appeals to Philemon to receive runaway slave Onesimus as a brother.
chapters.messageKo: 그가 전에는 네게 무익하였으나 이제는 나와 네게 유익하니라.
chapters.messageEn: Formerly he was useless to you, but now he has become useful both to you and to me.

keyEvents.eventEn: No longer slave but dear brother

keyEvents.eventKo: 그가 빚진 것이 있으면 내게 청구하라
keyEvents.eventEn: If he owes, charge it to me
